body_html:
@byronyi it uses nccl as default all-reduce operations. The simplest workaround it to install nccl, or specifiy cross_tower_ops=tf.contrib.distribute.ReductionToOneDeviceCrossTowerOps in MirroredStrategy. If you have multiple workers in your cluster, MirroredStrategy will switch to another cross_tower_ops. Would that work for you?

We probably can check whether nccl is installed and if not switch to ReductionToOneDeviceCrossTowerOps in the future.

@byronyi it uses nccl as default all-reduce operations. The simplest workaround it to install nccl, or specifiy `cross_tower_ops=tf.contrib.distribute.ReductionToOneDeviceCrossTowerOps` in `MirroredStrategy`. If you have multiple workers in your cluster, `MirroredStrategy` will switch to another `cross_tower_ops`. Would that work for you?

We probably can check whether `nccl` is installed and if not switch to `ReductionToOneDeviceCrossTowerOps` in the future.
